pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/pyksolve/badge/?version=latest)](https://pyksolve.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/tcdude/py-klondike-solver.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/tcdude/py-klondike-solver)# Cython wrapper for [ShootMe/Klondike-Solver][ks]Thin Python package to wrap the functionality of the [Klondike-Solver][ks] foruse in Python using Cython.To get started, have a look at the [documentation][docs].[ks]: https://github.com/ShootMe/Klondike-Solver[docs]: https://pyksolve.readthedocs.io
